thread.title: Portsmouth chief executive tells sceptical fans to get on board with former Disney boss Michael Eisner’s ‘dream ticket to the Premier League’
thread.title_full: Portsmouth chief executive tells sceptical fans to get on board with former Disney boss Michael Eisner’s ‘dream ticket to the Premier League’

author: fnathan
title: Portsmouth chief executive tells sceptical fans to get on board with former Disney boss Michael Eisner’s ‘dream ticket to the Premier League’
text:
EFL pomp and circumstance Portsmouth chief executive tells sceptical fans to get on board with former Disney boss Michael Eisner’s ‘dream ticket to the Premier League’ 
Fan-owned League 2 outfit received a bid this week from one of the world's richest men who is worth around £1.2billion... but many are reluctant By Fred Nathan 26th March 2017, 5:17 pm Updated: 26th March 2017, 5:17 pm
